tr.td: Photo Credit Card/ Debit card (with Photo)
Domicile Certificate / Caste Certificate with photograph
Current passbook of Post Office / Govt. /PSU Bank/private banks
Student ID card of the Govt. recognized educational institutions with photograph on it.
Ration Card with photograph & address. (Issued from Maharashtra state not valid )
Smart Card issued by CSD, Defence / Paramilitary Forces
Senior Citizen Card having photo issued by the Govt.
Pensioners Card having photo issued by the Govt.
ID Card issued to Tibetan (Refugees) Citizens by State Govt. / Central Govt. of India having photo
Defence Personnel - Armed Forces ;Certificate from Competent Unit Authority
Certificate of Address having Photo, issued by MP/ MLA / Group A Gazetted Officer on letter head with seal
Certificate of address with photo from Govt. recognized educational institution (for students only)
Certificate of Address having Photo, issued by Head of Village / Gram Panchayat or its equivalent Authority. (for Rural Areas)
Address Card with Photo issued by Dept. of Posts
Driving License (Issued from Maharashtra state not valid )
Electricity Bill of Govt./private company (not older than 3 months)
Telephone Bill of a fixed line. (Any Service Provider)
Ration Card with photograph. (Issued from Maharashtra state not valid )
Certificate of address with photo from Govt. recognized educational institution (for students only)
Current passbook of Post Office / Govt./PSU/private banks with complete address
ECHS / CGHS Card having photo & address
Domicile Certificate / Caste Certificate with photograph & address
Senior Citizen Card having photo & address issued by the Govt.
Pensioners Card having photo & address issued by the Govt.
ID Card issued to Tibetan (Refugees) Citizens by State Govt. / Central Govt. of India having photo & address
Defence Personnel – Armed Forces ;Certificate from Competent Unit Authority
Certificate of Address having Photo, issued by MP/ MLA / Group A Gazetted Officer on letter head with seal
Certificate of Address having Photo, issued by Head of Village / Gram Panchayat or its equivalent Authority. (for Rural Areas)
Address Card with Photo issued by Dept. of Posts
Freedom fighter card with photo & address
Surrender ID Card (BLT etc.) issued by Govt. of India & signed by IGP of the state
CGHS/ State Government/ ECHS/ ESIC Medical card
Birth Certificate issued by Registrar of Birth, Municipal Corporation and other notified local government bodies like Taluk, Tehsil etc.
Any other Central/ State government issued family entitlement document
Marriage Certificate issued by the government
Address card having name and photo issued by Department of Posts
Bhamashah Card/Jan-Aadhaar card issued by Govt. of Rajasthan
Discharge card/ slip issued by Government hospitals for birth of a child
Certificate of Identity having photo issued by MP or MLA or MLC or Municipal Councillor or Gazetted Officer on UIDAI standard certificate format
Certificate of Identity having photo and relationship with HoF issued by Village Panchayat Head or Mukhiya or its equivalent authority (for rural areas)
Birth Certificate issued by Registrar of Birth, Municipal Corporation and other notified local government bodies like Taluk, Tehsil etc.
Certificate of Date of Birth issued by Group A Gazetted Officer on UIDAI standard certificate format
A certificate (on UIDAI standard certificate format for enrolment/ update) or ID Card having photo and Date of Birth (DOB) duly signed and issued by a Government authority
Photo ID card having Date of Birth, issued by Recognized Educational Institution
Marksheet issued by any Government Board or University
Government Photo ID Card/ Photo Identity Card issued by PSU containing DOB
Central Government Health Service Scheme Photo Card or Ex-Servicemen Contributory Health Scheme Photo card
School Leaving Certificate (SLC)/ School Transfer Certificate (TC), containing Name and Date of Birth
Extract of School Records issued by Head of School containing Name, Date of Birth and Photograph
Certificate of Identity containing Name, DOB and Photo issued by Recognized Educational Institution signed by Head of Institute on UIDAI standard certificate format
Certificate of identity containing Name, DOB and Photograph issued by Employees’ Provident Fund Organisation (EPFO) on UIDAI standard certificate format
Photograph (any other required for claims adjudication)
Bhamashah Card or any other Insurance scheme card
Hospital stamped and signed hospital declaration form
Any other consent form or miscellaneous declaration form
Upward Referral Letter (referral from HWC, SC, PHC,CHC to District Hospital)
Downward Referral Letter (referral from higher facility to the original referee facility)
Treatment Authorization latter from employer(for public and private sector employees,CGHS, ECHS employees)
Patient Condition at time of admission after injury
Consumption of Poisonous substance detail(FIR Registered or not)
Attack on human body detail (FIR Registered or not)
Date-Time of Hospitalization Due to Accident
Primary and Secondary Payor Details (in case of Multi Payor claims)
Details of claim settled by primary payor (in case of secondary claims - attachment)
PMJAYInsurancePortabilityCase (Y/N) (treatment received in a different state)
PrimarySHADetails (SHA/TPA detail of state where PMJAY benefeciary belongs to)
SecondarySHADetails (SHA/TPA detail of state where benefeciary received treatment)
Employment impacted period (start date - end date)
HospitalizedIndicator (if patient was hospitalized or not - Y/N)
additional info related to claim ( conveying additional situation and condition information.)
Eligible Room Category as per T&C of Policy Contract
Photo of the location with subject
Real time geolocation from certified devices

description.value: This is the value set for the codes of different supporting information that can be shared along with the submission of a claim
